title: Bookee and Keeboo Play in the Snow
description: It has snowed a lot during the night... so let's play!This is Bookee and friends' fourth adventure. Let's hope they don't catch a cold in the snow!An ebook written and illustrated by Alfons Freire, produced by booqlab to TopTapTip.com ---TopTapTip is a series dedicated to publishing children ebooks, both new and already in print. We believe in a playful publishing process that respects the authors original concept and idea while providing a digital twist. We join reading with fun and education in multimedia and interactive colorful ebooks.
author: Alfons Freire
